Reviews.Title: Pass on this phone
Reviews.Author: JB "avid reader"
Reviews.Content: I had a Xenon which I loved. They replaced it with this crummy Encore phone aabout 6 months ago. It freezes ALL the time. I am always shutting the whole phone off just to send a text. The camera is horrible and takes very dark pictures even outside. I am on Amazon looking for a new phone as I write this because I can't stand the Encore. Pass on this phone. It looks cool but that's all it has going for it!

Reviews.Title: One of the worst phones available
Reviews.Author: Kondrath
Reviews.Content: 1. Terrible low-quality touch screen. You have to press repeatedly for it to register input.2. Has an LG-confirmed issue where all incoming SMS messages are timestamped about 5 hours off from the actual time.Our store has an entire drawer full of returned LG Encores. I don't even know why they keep sending them to us. Awful devices.

Reviews.Title: Decent phone, with a couple reservations
Reviews.Author: Graeck "grack"
Reviews.Content: A pretty decent phone. This replaced my LG Prime GS390, which this phone seems to be the successor to. Overall, it's a welcome upgrade. The UI is more intuitive and the camera is better.Only complaints. The camera is not very good for indoor photos - they turn out too dark, even when there's ample light in the room - though outdoor daylight photos can be quite good. Also, the touch screen is not as sensitive as my old LG GS390. I occasionally have a hard time selecting the letters in the drop down of the address book - which was never a problem on my old phone with an identical menu.

Reviews.Title: Finally a great phone!
Reviews.Author: Nichole
Reviews.Content: I love this phone! i have not had any problems with it at all. Its so much better the my Solstice 2! Its easier to text.the phone qaulity is just better in general. the picture came out great mine were not dark. I love how i can use the internet and it works really good, easy to use. It is a very small phone which is great too. I am really glad i got this=)

Reviews.Title: Don't. Get. This. Phone.
Reviews.Author: Dolly
Reviews.Content: I mean it. Like a previous reviewer, I absolutely LOVED my LG Xenon. This is a poor imitation. My biggest problem isn't the timestamps, I actually hadn't even noticed that. No, my biggest problem with this phone is the touch screen. Not nly do you pretty much have to pound on the thing for it to register touch, especially in the touch calibration, but the inaccuracy is laughable. Somehow, they have managed to make a phone that, when you hit the M (bottom right) it will register a T (top middle).. the letters aren't anywhere NEAR each other! It took me about 20 minutes (I am not exaggerating this) to text "Do you have a vacuum?" Because I had to backspace every letter, and half the time, trying to hit the backspace just hits another letter.This phone is terrible. It's not worth $20, let alone $100. Do yourself a favor and buy a phone that actually works.

Reviews.Title: common error this phone has
Reviews.Author: kaoshinkai
Reviews.Content: My Encore timestamps my txts 6 hrs off from the time they actually come in,there is no way to fix it. LG says they are working on a patch for it and have been since 10/2011. If you are new to touchscreen phones just at least dont get this one,having actual buttons are much better in general i find. But this phone is good only probs are txt msg timestamp problem and being a touchscreen.

Reviews.Title: A Good Phone Overall
Reviews.Author: NikeHoops13
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for Christmas this past year. Overall, it is a great phone and I have enjoyed it. It is great for talking, texting, and listening to music. The only cons of this phone are:- The touch screen is not always responsive. You will tap an icon on the screen and it will not respond immediately. Also, the touch screen doesn't always take gestures accurately. I tried re-calibrating the touch screen and it didn't solve the problem.- The time stamp on incoming texts is five hours behind. The guy at the At&t; Store said that this was a network problem.As a whole, this is a great phone and I would recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Phone
Reviews.Author: lewis5263
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone, easy to move around from one app to another. No hard to understand, great for someone starting out on a i-phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: Does much more than I expected. Blue tooth hooked up to car fast with no problems. Good buy for the money.

Reviews.Title: To use Dial Pad suck for touch screen.
Reviews.Author: mermaidtracy
Reviews.Content: When you add a card in this phone the dial pad shut off in 60 seconds. I hate it. Then the screen locks when shortly after send someone a text. Im taken this phone back the old phone that flip upon or slider are better then this phone tochsreen suck.

Reviews.Title: DONT BUY!
Reviews.Author: A.Norris
Reviews.Content: Well, i was looking for a nice, touchscreen no contract phone. And i finally thought i had it! Until a few months after i got it, it froze, all the time. When you change the menu under display, so its not tabs, everytime a white screen with 4 lines thru it. So i got a replacement. It did the same thing. So i got ANOTHER replacement. Didnt wprk. So im here now looking for a new phone. Dont get this phone. It seems great at first.

Reviews.Title: got it from walmart read tthis!
Reviews.Author: cocoloveamazonj
Reviews.Content: i paid 99(it wasnt worth it) had it for 9 . Months it was better than my old net10 phone. Toutube and apps! It only started actin up 6 months later . It hav no security fewtures except lockim when it first come on . Itx keyboard is small . Sometims the internet is down . The screen ia easy to mess up . I hav tons of music but overall its a pretty good phone.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone So Long As.....
Reviews.Author: Siffert
Reviews.Content: Good Phone so long as you are not a heavy text user orheavy Internet user. The LG Encore is great for phone use as its 3G coverage by AT&T; is terrific. My Sprint 2G Sanyo SCP-8400 coverage out here in the Chihuahuan Desert gave me 1-2 bars inside the house and 0-1 bars walking in the desert. The LG Encore with 3G (with goPhone coverage) gives me 3-4 bars in the house and 4-5 bars walking in the desert!! It also has a great MP3 player along with excellent Bluetooth support.This phone is considered a "feature" phone and NOTa "smartphone" as it does not use an operating system like Android, Windows etc. Thus, really no "apps" for it. It is small and light, making it very handy to fit in your pocket. On the other hand, it's relative small screen (compared to a smartphone) makes going on the internet kinda cumbersome. I just use it myself for when really necessary rather than surfing. Still, with the AT&T; goPhone $50.00 unlimited plan you get unlimited internet usage without needing an additional data plan. (Feature phones only)On the downside, it uses a resistive touchscreen. Resistive type touchscreens require much more pressure to activate than capacitive touchscreens. Thus, on occasion it does not initially respond to your touches. Resistive also makes doing text more difficult. Not a problem for me as I do not text much. The backlight timer has a max of 60 seconds. Not enough for my tastes. Standard internal memory on it is also low along with no flash or autofocus on the camera.Still, with the minor cons, all in all, this is exactly what I need in a cellphone for now. Battery life is pretty good too.Tip-you can also use Mini Opera (version 7 or 4.4 (make sure when downloading you select "other options" and "all certificates") as an alternative Web browser.Update-after almost a year of use, this phone has beenproblem free save for an occasional freeze/lock-upwhereby you have to remove the battery and put it back in, to get it going again.

Reviews.Title: I Regret It
Reviews.Author: annacat
Reviews.Content: I thought a touch screen phone would be great!! I used to text on my IPod so I was used to it. BUT THIS IS DIFFERENT. You have to pound on it for the touch screen to pick your touch up. Also if you are texting sideways when you rotate it, it takes a long time to realize you rotated it. Plus im getting these weird purple spots all over the screen electronically. I am thinking about buying a new phone with a keyboard. :(

Reviews.Title: Joke?
Reviews.Author: Spencer
Reviews.Content: The phone is a joke, my Sanding Mythic was a beauty compared to this. This Encore freezes all the time and the touch screen is terrible on it. I think my old Motorola RAZR was faster than this. I got tired of it after a month and decided to buy a Motorola ATRIX and boy what a difference. The Motorola is incredibly fast and responsive, unlike this slow thing. Look elsewhere

Reviews.Title: Very pleased w/ product
Reviews.Author: KAT
Reviews.Content: This Item arrived in a timely manner and is very easy to use! Bought it for my son and he loves it!!

ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable, sleek touchscreen phone with virtual QWERTY keyboard and pre-loaded social networking apps
Pay for just the minutes you use with no annual contract--easy refill via Internet or prepaid cards
3-megapixel camera/camcorder; Bluetooth stereo music; microSD expansion to 32 GB; access to personal e-mail and instant messaging
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 240 hours (10 days) of standby time; released in September, 2010
What's in the Box: handset, rechargeable battery, charger, quick start guide, GoPhone SIM card
ProductInfo.Name: LG Encore Prepaid GoPhone (AT&T)
